medevac_road_osm:
%base_info% In this mission you will provide HEMS assistance performing a patient extraction by landing near a traffic accident location designated on your GPS.
Details on the target location will be provided at mission start. Usage of a helicopter is mandatory.
Hints: - Land within a radius of 80m around the designated accident location. - Shut down engines - Observe status messages and follow instructions if requested. - Wait for signal to take off. - Start engines and proceed to next GPS waypoint.
